property.name: Traits
property.value: Kingsguard. Rainbow Guard. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Discard a card at random from your hand and bring Knight of Flowers out of Shadows to save a unique character from being killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only. Renown.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn. Rainbow Guard. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Robar Royce is participating in a challenge, each Rainbow Guard character you control gains deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: If you control 1 or more Rainbow Guard characters, kneel all copies of Rainbow Guard Squire you control to draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Captain. Raider.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you declare The Drumm as an attacker, choose a location controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 4 or more total STR, discard that location. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel The Sea Tower to reduce the cost of the next [Greyjoy] character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Weapon. Item.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After attached character is declared as an attacker, choose a character controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 4 or more total STR, discard the chosen character from play. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Unique [Greyjoy] character only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to opponent's location effects.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After Ser Kevan Lannister enters or leaves play, choose a [Lannister] or neutral location in your discard pile and put it into play. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character does not stand during the standing phase. Discard Enemy of the Queen if attached character's controller wins an [INT] challenge against you by 4 or more total STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you reveal a plot card, each opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand, if able. Then, Ghost Hill Elite claims 1 power if any locations or attachments were discarded by this effect. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kill Prince's Attendant (cannot be saved) to reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard 1 and add the other to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Weapon. Item.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, choose a character. That character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. Then, if that character has no challenge icons, kill it. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Choose and kill a character with printed cost 3 or lower controlled by an opponent who has not declared a [MIL] challenge against you this round. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While a character you control is defending alone, it gets +1 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After an attachment leaves play, stand 1 influence providing card that you control to draw 1 card. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [INT] challenges, the Claim value on your revealed plot card is increased by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Limited.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raven. Creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Discard Greenseer's Raven from your hand to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a just revealed plot card with one or more Traits.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of the first character with printed cost 4 or higher you play each round by 2. Characters you control with printed cost 4 or higher gain prized 1 while leaving play, and cannot be returned to your hand by your card effects or to pay costs.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle. Intrigue Gambit. Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot initiate more than 1 challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this plot is placed in your used pile, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a non-Army character with printed cost 4 or higher, and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rainbow Guard. Lady.

property.name: Text
property.value: Brienne of Tarth is considered to have the Knight trait. Limited Response: After Brienne of Tarth kneels, each opponent may move 1 power to your House card from a card he or she controls. Any opponent who does not cannot play event cards this round. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win dominance, choose up to X standing characters to claim 1 power each. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After an opponent reveals a plot card, kneel Thunderer to choose an opponent and discard the top card of his or her deck. If that card is a character or location, draw 1 card. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Greyjoy Only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose a [Greyjoy] character. That character gets +1 STR until the end of the phase. Dominance: Kneel a Warship location to return Command the Winds from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to give Ulf Son of Umar any keyword or crest printed on another character in play until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Pay 1 gold to give each participating Clansman character you control +1 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The Vale.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Vale Encampment (cannot be saved) to reduce the cost of the next Clansman card you play this phase by 1. When you play that card, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Sand Snake. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, set the Claim value on your revealed plot card to 2 until the end of the phase. (While set, the value cannot be raised or lowered.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel The Red Mountains to choose a [Martell] character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the Sand Snake trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kill a Sand Snake character you control to choose and return up to 3 [Shadow] cards to Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell Only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, move 1 power from the attacking player's House card to your own.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. Immune to opponent's events.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each House Tully character you control gains 'immune to oppoent's triggered effects' while it is participating in a challenge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Seagard to choose a defending character you control. That character gets +2 STR and gains deadly until the end of the challenge. If you win the challenge, stand Seagard.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win a challenge in which Khal Drogo attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, the losing player must choose and kill 1 character he or she controls, randomly discard 1 card from his or her hand, and move 1 power from his or her house card to yours.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Handmaiden. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Irri would be killed, you may instead attach her to a [Targaryen] character as a Handmaiden attachment with the text, 'Attached character gains a [POW] icon, and does not kneel to attack during [POW] challenges.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is at least 1 Castle plot card revealed, Mya Stone gains: "Opponent's characters with printed cost 3 or lower cannot be declared alone as attackers."

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel The Eyrie to save a non-Army character with printed cost 4 or higher from being killed or discarded from play. Then, discard all power on that character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to plot card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this plot is placed in your used pile, choose an opponent's character with printed cost 3 or lower. Take control of that character until a new plot is placed in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this plot is placed in your used pile, choose 1 character you control, and return it to the bottom of its owner's deck (cannot be saved).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rainbow Guard. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a Rainbow Guard character. That character gains renown until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Bannerman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to stand Storm’s End Freerider.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King. Raider. Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Euron Crow’s Eye is attacking alone, opponents cannot declare defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of any challenge phase in which Silence Crewman was not declared as an attacker, kill it and discard the top 2 cards of each opponent’s deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which Gunthor Son of Gurn participated, draw cards, ignoring the draw cap, until the losing opponent does not have more cards in hand than you. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Payne.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel Ser Ilyn Payne to choose and kill a kneeling character with printed cost 3 or lower.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Epic Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single [MIL] challenge with normal claim. During this epic phase, each unique Clansman and Mercenary character gains melee. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Sand Snake. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After a Sand Snake character you control is killed, choose and kill a character with an equal or lower printed cost. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, choose a participating Sand Snake character you control to claim 1 power. Then, if this was the first challenge initiated this phase, stand that character and draw 1 card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel Red Mountain Keep to shuffle a Sand Snake character from your dead pile back into your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Maester.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 House Tully character participated, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand. (Limit one limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a House Tully character. That character gains deadly until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of House Tully characters you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. Renown. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Queensguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a Dothraki character. That character gains stealth until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Handmaiden. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Jhiqui would be killed, you may instead attach her to a [Targaryen] character as a Handmaiden attachment with the text, "Attached character gains an [INT] icon and does not kneel to attack during [INT] challenges."

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [MIL] challenges, the Claim value on your revealed plot card is increased by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Limited.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. House Arryn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Vale Informant gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The Vale.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel The Moon Door and kneel a unique House Arryn character to choose and kill a character with printed cost 3 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this plot is placed in your used pile, put a card with printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: All players skip the standing phase this round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Prized 3.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rainbow Guard. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [POW] challenges in which you control at least 1 attacking Rainbow Guard character, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camp Follower gets +1 STR for each Knight character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you reveal a plot card, kneel Renly’s Pavilion to claim 1 power for your House. Then, if it is summer, add 1 gold token from the treasury to your gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Iron Fleet Pillager participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent’s deck. If that card is a location or attachment, you may put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you have won 2 or more unopposed challenges this phase. Challenges: Choose and discard 1 character and 1 location, each with printed cost 3 or lower, from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play The Mountain Clan Horde by 1 for each Clansman character you control. Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to stand or kneel another Clansman character. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Sand Snake. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After another Sand Snake character you control is killed, put Obella Sand into Shadows from your dead pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from your hand, kneel Doran’s Solar to draw 2 cards. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you lose a challenge, kill a Sand Snake character you control to choose a character. Until the end of the game, that character gains prized 1 and loses all instances of all challenge icons. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Sansa Stark, discard Alayne Stone from play. Response: After Alayne Stone enters play, choose a Castle plot card in your used pile. Reveal it as your new plot card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a participating [Stark] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of nonparticipating characters you control. If you have a Military Battle plot card revealed and you win the challenge, that character claims 1 power.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Queensguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Attach a [Targaryen] or neutral Weapon attachment from your discard pile to a Dothraki character you control. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Bannerman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard a card from your hand to give Lesser Ko deadly until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [POW] challenges, the Claim value on your revealed plot card is increased by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Limited.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. House Arryn. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Lysa Arryn to cancel a triggered effect with any form of the word "plot" or "non-plot" in its text.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Littlefinger, discard Petyr Baelish from play. Limited Response: Kneel Petyr Baelish to cancel the effects of an event card just played. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Arryn. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your non-Army characters with printed cost 4 or higher gets +2 STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Knight. House Arryn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Knights Declarant by 2 for each plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a neutral or in-House Creature card with printed cost 3 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. If it is a Direwolf, you may put it into play instead. Then, shuffle your deck.
